description: Tony DiAngelo ponders: How can I put the spark back into my relationship with Chase Hunter? Perhaps a threesome? Just the idea of having a big sexy man coming in and sucking Chase's giant dick while he fucks my tight ass is kinda appealing. It sounds interesting, but I think we should wait. Meanwhile, let other folk like Brent Stevens, Sal Antonio & Scott Davis hop on the such-n-fuck merry-go-round if that's what they're into.
title: Hold Me Again, Scene #03
